comments.999: The code for tidy lives [here](https://github.com/servo/servo/tree/80488c4494911257e62c98388b36d94d74f9d330/python/tidy/servo_tidy). The config file for servo is [here](https://github.com/servo/servo/blob/80488c4494911257e62c98388b36d94d74f9d330/servo-tidy.toml) and for webrender, it's [here](https://github.com/servo/webrender/blob/6cc2c6a4bd5ad0d3544b1568d02848efb29ca255/servo-tidy.toml)

comment.body: The code for tidy lives [here](https://github.com/servo/servo/tree/master/python/tidy/servo_tidy). The config file for servo is [here](https://github.com/servo/servo/blob/master/servo-tidy.toml) and for webrender, it's [here](https://github.com/servo/webrender/blob/master/servo-tidy.toml)
